New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 39 points in 29 minutes
Key Match Events: Oklahoma City had a 36-12 run in the first half
Oklahoma City closed the first quarter with a 12-0 spurt
Oklahoma City unleashed a 19-5 run over more than six minutes of the second
Pre-Game Insights: The Thunder were coming off a 129-122 loss at NBA-leading Cleveland
The Knicks were looking to bounce back from their 15-game win streak being snapped
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks were booed multiple times in the first half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder outscored the Knicks 68-36 over consecutive quarters
The Thunder had a 37-19 advantage in the decisive fourth quarter last Friday
Others: The Knicks host Milwaukee on Sunday
The Thunder visit Washington that night
